Title: U.S. visa restriction tied to Nigeria’s refusal to host asylum seekers  — Report
Summary: The recent tightening of U.S. visa restrictions for Nigerian citizens is linked to Nigeria’s refusal to accept third-country asylum seekers as part of a broader immigration agreement proposed by President Donald Trump .

Title: Troops dismantle gunrunning syndicate, nab two in Taraba
Summary: Troops of the Nigerian Army’s 6 Brigade, operating from the Forward Operating Base (FOB) in Wukari, have dismantled a gunrunning syndicate in the southern region of Taraba State . According to a statement signed by Olubodunde Oni, Acting Assistant Director of the 6 Brigade .

Title: NOA, EFCC partner to tackle cybercrime
Summary: National Orientation Agency (NOA) and Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) have announced plans to embark on a nationwide sensitisation campaign to educate Nigerians about virtual asset and investment fraud . NOA, EFCC partner to tackle cybercrime .

Title: If anything happens to my children, hold Lizzy Anjorin responsible –  Iyabo Ojo
Summary: Nollywood actress, Iyabo Ojo, has said that her colleague, Lizzy Anjorin, should be held accountable if anything happens to her or her children . The 47-year-old actress made this known on Friday in a video shared via her Instagram page .

Title: ‘My family was hacked to death’: Benue attack survivors share harrowing tales
Summary: Survivors of the June 13 attack on Yelewata and Daudu communities in Guma Local Government Area of Benue State have provided harrowing accounts of the assault . Federal Government prepares to prosecute 26 individuals arrested in connection with the attack .

Title: Demolished building: Church seeks ‘commensurate’ compensation from Lagos Govt
Summary: The Deeper Life Bible Church has sought compensation for demolition of its church building . The church also seeks protection of its members while carrying out lawful activities on the land .

Title: Two dead, 10 injured in Jigawa auto crash
Summary: Two dead, 10 injured in Jigawa auto crash . Corps recovered N2.1 million belonging to one of the deceased victims and one survivor .

Title: UK economy shrinks for the second month in a row
Summary: Gross domestic product shrinks 0.1 percent in May, following a 0.3 percent contraction in April . UK economy shrinks for the second month in a row .

Title: What is AI Video Upscaling and How Does It Work?
Summary: AI video upscaling uses machine learning to enhance the quality of videos . This technology makes them look sharper, clearer, and more detailed . It is changing the way we experience visual media .

Title: ADC politicians deceiving the poor, Tinubu loyalist alleges
Summary: Leaders of African Democratic Congress (ADC) accused of deceiving poor Nigerians under guise of being their defenders . Khamis Darazo, a northern youth leader and staunch loyalist of President Bola Tinubu, has accused them of being deceiving Nigerians .
